content.text:
[cron:e78d8581-f2b2-47f7-b79c-c469c401e6c9 Morning Board Check] Morning board check.

1. Update Veritas Kanban to latest: `cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/veritas-kanban && git pull origin main && pnpm install && pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter cli build && chmod +x cli/dist/index.js`
2. Start the board server if it's not running: `cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/veritas-kanban && pnpm dev` (background)
3. Run `vk summary` and `vk list` to check for new or updated tasks
4. Report the status to Bill via Discord DM ‚Äî include version, task summary, and any changes since yesterday
Current time: Tuesday, February 17th, 2026 ‚Äî 9:04 AM (America/New_York)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.

content.text:
- **Open PRs:** #60 (dashboard, 200/200 threads resolved, merge-ready), #64 (railway config), #65 (persistent logging, round 3 done)
- **All other PRs merged:** #14, #15, #16, #18, #57, #59, #62, #63

---

## Evening Session (6:30 PM - 7:15 PM)

### Context Overflow & Sub-Agent Splitting Strategy

- Sub-agents hitting context overflow on large tasks (16+ threads)
- Root cause: accumulated tool call history fills 200K Opus context window during long sessions
- **Solution: split tasks into 5-8 thread batches** ‚Äî works reliably
- Tried reducing `bootstrapTotalMaxChars` from 64K‚Üí40K but Bill wanted it back at 64K for Pip main
- Per-agent `bootstrapTotalMaxChars` not supported in config schema (only on `agents.defaults`)
- **Decision: keep splitting, don't trim workspace files**

### PR #60 ‚Äî Web Dashboard Shell (MERGE-READY)

- Round 19: Split 9 threads into 2 batches (A: 5 threads, B: 4 threads)
  - All 9 were already fixed in prior rounds, just needed GraphQL thread resolves
- Round 20: Final 2 threads (guild icon CDN path fix, shadowed variable rename)
  - Commit `326e610`: getGuildIconUrl returns null instead of wrong /embed/avatars/ path
  - Renamed local `guilds` ‚Üí `fetchedGuilds` in server-selector.tsx
- **200/200 threads resolved across 20 rounds** ‚Äî 101 tests passing
- Bill asked to fix remaining comments so we can merge

### PR #65 ‚Äî Persistent Logging (Round 2-3)

- Round 2: 16 threads split into 3 batches (A: 8, B: 6, C: 3)
  - Batch A: startup wiring, data loss prevention, resource leak, timestamps/validation ‚Äî all already committed
  - Batch B: ILIKE escaping, level validation, query errors, initLogsTable transaction ‚Äî all already committed
  - Batch C: test improvements (mock factory, behavioral tests, concurrent flush) ‚Äî committed but timed out before resolving all threads
  - All 16 original threads resolved, 887 tests passing
- Round 3: 6 new threads from CI reviewer on round 2 commits
  - CRITICAL: initLogsTable failure crashing startup ‚Üí try/catch wrapper
  - HIGH: Unbounded buffer on DB outage ‚Üí MAX_BUFFER=10000 cap
  - MEDIUM: pruneOldLogs failure aborting startup, invalid flush interval/batchSize
  - LOW: retentionDays `|| 30` ‚Üí `?? 30` (explicit 0 support)
  - NITPICK: logger.remove() in try/finally
  - All 6 resolved, 893 tests passing

### Config Changes

- `bootstrapTotalMaxChars`: Briefly set to 40K, reverted to 64K per Bill's request
- No per-agent override available for this setting

### Worktree Cleanup Needed

- `/home/bill/bb-logr2` ‚Äî PR #65 worktree moved out of openclaw tree
- Various `/tmp/bills-bot-*` worktrees from sub-agents
